divs: sighting detailswhile waiting for a red light to change in the intersection of route 111 and route 25, i glanced at the sunset. suddenly, i noticed a metallic colored cylindrical object moving slowly at a 45 degree angle. the object moved at a slow pace and was high in the sky. in attempt to keep an eye on the object i started driving slowly when the light changed to green. however, the cars behind me kept beeping their horns and i had to move. once on route 25 going south, i stopped by the shoulder and tried to locate the object again but was not able to. i did not plan to report this incident until another person reported an incident on the 29th, see "amber object w\angular direction change".
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Trumbull
There were no other sightings in Trumbull on or around June 28th 2009
Summary: A metallic cylindrical object moving slowly at a 45 degree angle from west to east.
